official_title: To amend the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to designate Edmonson, Hart, and Metcalfe Counties, Kentucky, as part of the Appalachian region.

summary.text: Amends the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1985 to add Edmonson, Hart, and Metcalfe Counties, Kentucky, to the Appalachian region.

titles.title: To amend the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to designate Edmonson, Hart, and Metcalfe Counties, Kentucky, as part of the Appalachian region.
